      Parse the OCL file at the given location and return the Constraint it contains This method will register the given EPackage before parsing the file in order to avoid parse errors.

      • isMogwaiCompatible

        public static boolean isMogwaiCompatible(Resource resource)
        Returns true if an EMF resource can be used by Mogwaï
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to check
        Returns:
        true if the resource can be used by Mogwaï, false otherwise

      • parseOCL

        public static Constraint parseOCL(URI location,
                                  EPackage ePackage)
        Parse the OCL file at the given location and return the Constraint it contains

        This method will register the given EPackage before parsing the file in order to avoid parse errors.

        Parameters:
        location - the URI of the OCL file to parse
        ePackage - the EPackage describing the meta-elements used in the constraints
        Returns:
        the Constraint contained in the OCL file TODO Allow multiple constraints definition in a single OCL file

      • parseOCL

        public static Constraint parseOCL(URI location)
        Parse the OCL file at the given location and return the Constraint is contains

        This method assumes the accessed EPackage in the Constraint has been registered somehow before

        Parameters:
        location - the URI of the OCL file to parse
        Returns:
        the Constraint contained in the OCL file

                                           EClassifier context)
                                    throws MogwaiException
        Throws:
        MogwaiException
